name: Codewalla Mobile
description:
Codewalla is a team of Mobile Product Developers. Our team can take product ideas from concept through UI/UX design, coding for multiple platforms and in to operations.
Founded in 2006, Codewalla Mobile took root as a development center for Real Networks engaging a niche development team. Codewalla has worked closely with some of the now famous names such as Lumos Labs ( Lumosity), Trebeca Tables (acquired by PlayTech), Triple Point Technologies (now Ion Investments) and Tresensa as a technology partners.
We spearheaded mobile initiatives of our partners leveraging our expertise in product development, project management and solution delivery. With an in-depth understanding of mobile and server side concepts we have created social learning platforms, mobile business intelligence solutions, decision support systems, mobile tools for sales people to customer directed mobile games. We have worked with companies in Healthcare, Commodity Trading, Logistics, Corporate Training, Education and Mobile gaming.
Our Services:
Mobile Product Development
Product Consulting
Mobile Enterprise Solutions
User Experience
Games
You can learn more about us at http://www.codewalla.com/
